author: farhan
title: UNI STUDENT ASK FOR BLOWJOB IN RETURN FOR HELPING GIRL WITH STUDIES
text:
UNI STUDENT ASK FOR BLOWJOB IN RETURN FOR HELPING GIRL WITH STUDIES   Mon, 06/02/2017 - 2:50pm 
A pretty female student at a private university was having difficulties with her studies and reached out for help, but the kind of help she got left her feeling disgusted and humiliated. 
She was approached online by a man named D, who said that he could offer her help with her course. Halfway through the conversation, he revealed his true intention. Advertisement 
He wanted a blowjob (oral sex) as payment for his "help". 
This left the lady feeling very disgusted, and she promptly shamed the man online. 
Read her account here. 
"So i was really having some difficulties with one of my modules and I posted on fb. This guy came to pm me saying that he did the module before and offered to help me. But halfway through the conversation, he questioned me if he can get anything in return. So it turned out that he wants a blowjob in return. Like are you serious bro? What I wanted was just some clarifications for a small part of the module. I wonder why do some guys show so little respect for girls. Do you even know what is shame? 
Girls, please beware of this guy D. Disrespectful faggot." Source:
